alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 5:51AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Tuscaloosa, eastern Pickens, northern Greene and south central Fayette Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 551 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ethelsville to Johnston Lake to New West Greene. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Tuscaloosa, Northport, Aliceville, Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Coker, Union, McMullen, Samantha, West Greene, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Lake Lurleen State Park, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Garden, New West Greene, Mantua and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
